ISSUE.TITLE: Respect .gitignore file when deploying
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Vercel's cli to deploy is great BUT it should respect the gitignore file. If I'm using Vercel via a GitHub repo connection it respects that - since pushing to GitHub respects it. But if I'm using Vercel solely from a local repo via the cli, it does not respect that. Instead it requires me to add and maintain a `.vercelignore` file. Respecting the `.gitignore` file would follow the principle of least surprise and keep users safer. additional info: https://vercel.com/docs/concepts/deployments/vercel-ignore

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [cli] Use `getNodeBinPaths()` in `vc dev` (#10225) This allows for the "dev command" of a Project to work better in monorepos, where the dev server might live up the node_modules hierarchy within the repo.
